document_data.name: Rageborn
document_data.mainbody: A '''rageborn''' was a type of [[demon]]. The vast majority of rageborn were found within the 23{{rd}} layer of the [[Abyss]], the [[Iron Wastes]]. With the rise of [[Kostchtchie]] to power came a massive increase in rageborn numbers, and they all served Kostchtchie.
document_data.Behavior: Rageborn were not particularly intelligent, but were instead creatures of raw fury They delighted in violence and excelled at inflicting it. While they were not known to seek out allies unless forced to do so, they were known to rove the Iron Wastes in bands, mindlessly and hungrily attacking anything they encountered.
document_data.Abilities:
A rageborn's battle cry was said to be infused with the dark will of Kostchtchie. Different types of rageborn possessed different forms of elemental [[magic]], and some also possessed a powerful leaping ability that they used to quickly attack their enemies.

All rageborn possessed an ability to adapt to and resist the first type of any elemental magic that targeted them.
document_data.Combat: The rageborn fought with a mixture of magic and their bare claws.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Bitter Frost|23}}
